channel.title: msyql on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in msyql on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: MySQL的一些知识
item.description: ubuntu 重装 mysql 删除 mysql 1 2 3 4 sudo apt purge mysql-* sudo rm -rf /etc/mysql/ /var/lib/mysql sudo apt autoremove sudo apt autoreclean 安装 mysql 1 2 3 sudo apt install mysql-server sudo apt install mysql-client sudo apt install libmysqlclient-dev 期间会要求输入密码 1 2 sudo netstat -tap | grep mysql # 查看mysql是
